name: Indie Strikers
description:
This is a game that is still in development. I plan on making more characters in the future.  You also need two players on the same PC to play this.                                                  

Controls

  • Navigate through User Interface using Up and downPress numpad 1 to select UI button
  • In Character Select, move using arrow keys for player 1 or WASD for player 2
  • Select character by pressing numpad 1 for player 1 and R for player 2  on the character icon
  • Start button is Enter

Items:

Pick up items by  running into them.

  • Sniper: Shoots automatically for 10 seconds
  • Apple: Regenerates 1 heart
  • Capsule: Throw it to attack enemies.  Please click on controls in menu for more information.

Please Download the project.
